request.description:
Precondition: 
- find the pod name of kong-one `kubectl get pods -n batterypass`
- forward the admin-port to localhost: `kubectl port-forward kong-one-kong-<id> 8001:8001 -n batterypass`

item.name: Policy creation ONE allows "BATTERY-CRUD" for TWO
Policy creation ONE allows "BATTERY-CRUD" for ONE
Policy creation ONE allows "BATTERY-GET-SoC" for THREE
THREE -> GET BATTERIE SoC from ONE
THREE -> GET BATTERIE from ONE denied
